A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lazy writing\, poor fan service\, ridiculous Disney creatures. The plot holes and lack of continuity are numerous. No payoff for major characters - Phasma and Finn alone could be non-existent and there would be 0 change to the story.  One character becomes space superman while the other is in full blue-milk emo crisis. Again\, no one seems to know where the larger story is going and have not paid attention to where it has been. Needless to say - disappointing.
